about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Senior SRE working on the UpLink team at DataSnipper, passionate about building scalable and reliable infrastructure. Combining a strong software development background with deep SRE & DevOps expertise, I design scalable, reliable systems and build self-service pipelines that empower teams to move fast without sacrificing stability. Whether I'm writing microservices in Go or Python, authoring Terraform modules, or crafting reusable automation workflows, my focus is always on driving efficiency, reducing toil, and ensuring rock-solid production reliability.
